snippet.title: BRUTAL DOOM KICKASS Edition All Weapons Showcase
snippet.description:
Brutal Doom Kickass Edition ALL Weapons Showcase, this is a Brutal DOOM fork made by D-Boi, it has lots of weapons and it is currently in the 4.0 beta phase. As I mentioned there are really lots of weapons, you can find over 25 of them including the Doom Eternal Ballista, Cyberdemon's Missile Launcher, Revolvers, MP-40 or M1911 Pistol. It also includes tons of new sprites for existing weapons such as Rocket Launcher, Minigun, Super Shotgun or Pump-Action Shotgun (these I mentioned are truly greatly refreshed). Modification has also built the Dash system known from Doom Eternal.

00:00 - Fists
00:28 - Chainsaw
00:46 - Hatchet
01:10 - Standard Pistol
01:35 - M1911
02:03 - MP40
02:35 - Revolver
03:05 - Uzi
03:27 - SMG
03:46 - Pump-Action Shotgun
04:15 - Super Shotgun
04:54 - Assault Shotgun
05:30 - Minigun
06:08 - Assault Rifle
06:34 - Nailgun
07:19 - General Purpose Machine Gun
08:00 - Rocket Launcher
08:45 - Grenade Launcher
09:23 - Plasma Rifle
09:56 - Railgun
10:27 - Ballista
11:00 - BFG 9000
11:40 - BFG 10000
12:28 - Cyberdemon Missile Launcher
13:19 - Revenant Missile Launcher
13:58 - Mancubus Cannon
14:45 - XM21 Sniper Rifle
15:30 - Unmaker

Brutal Doom Kickass - https://www.moddb.com/mods/brutal-doom-kickass-edition/downloads/brutal-doom-kickass-edition-v40-eternal-update
My Discord Server - https://discord.gg/skpZWagjTJ
ReShade - https://reshade.me/​
